data.eml:eml: Nomenclatural Notes on the Eurytomids (Chalcidoidea: Eurytomidae) Described by Jean Brèthes Housed in Museo Argentino de Ciencias Naturales “ Bernardino Rivadavia ”

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gates, Michael W. (2014): Nomenclatural Notes on the Eurytomids (Chalcidoidea: Eurytomidae) Described by Jean Brèthes Housed in Museo Argentino de Ciencias Naturales “ Bernardino Rivadavia ”. Zootaxa 3790 (1): 185-193, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3790.1.9
